fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Hidden: If you play no cards this phase, satchel 1 card in your hand of your choice.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Distract: All attacking cards Chaos plays in this phase will appear to be from random non-Chaos members. [1 use, Unique]
- Trance: Pick a non-King player. See their hand (excluding satcheled cards). Play up to 2 cards for them. [1 use, Unique]
- Enrapture: Pick a player. Any card they use for themselves this phase will be Trapped. [1 use, Unique]
